amendment.description: To require that amounts appropriated to the Department of Veterans Affairs for medical and prosthetic research are used to ensure the provision of gender appropriate prosthetics and to conduct research related to toxic exposure.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2779 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2779 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7879) To require that amounts appropriated to the Department of Veterans Affairs for medical and prosthetic research are used to ensure the provision of gender appropriate prosthetics and to conduct research related to toxic exposure.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2779 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2779 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 2763.
